select swm.wkod_no --작업허가서ID ,swm.wkod_num --작업허가NO ,swm.wkod_kind_cd --작업종류코드 ,WKCode.code_nm as wkod_kind_nm --작업종류명 ,swm.work_ymd --작업일자 ,swm.work_start_time --작업시작시간 ,swm.work_end_time --작업종료시간 ,swm.work_over_time --작업연장시간 ,swm.work_complete_time --작업완료일시 ,swm.work_title --작업명 ,swm.work_content --작업내용 ,swm.wkod_step_cd --진행단계 ,PSCode.code_nm as wkod_step_nm --진행단계명 ,swm.req_step_confirm_yn --신청단계확인여부 ,swm.pub_step_confirm_yn --발행단계확인여부 ,swm.app_step_confirm_yn --승인단계확인여부 ,swm.plant_cd --작업지역_공장코드 ,swm.process_cd --작업지역_공정코드 ,CPCode.process_nm --작업지역_공정명 ,swm.work_area --작업지역_상세장소 ,swm.req_user_id --신청부서담당자ID ,swm.req_user_nm --신청부서담당자성명 ,swm.req_dept_cd --신청부서코드 ,swm.req_dept_nm --신청부서명 ,swm.req_ymd --신청일 ,swm.pub_dept_cd --발행부서코드 ,swm.pub_dept_nm --발행부서명 ,swm.pub_mgr_nm --감독자명 ,swm.pub_mgr_id --감독자ID ,swm.pub_mgr_tel --감독자 전화번호 ,swm.subconn_nm --작업업체명 ,swm.subconn_user_nm --작업업체담당자명 ,swm.subconn_user_tel --작업업체담당자 전화번호 ,swm.worker_numb --작업인원수 ,swm.special_instructions --특별지시사항 ,swm.handle_chem_content --취급물질(내용) ,swm.pub_user_id --발행부서확인자ID ,swm.pub_user_nm --발행부서확인자성명 ,swm.pub_confirm_dt --발행부서확인일시 ,swm.app_user_id --승인부서확인자ID ,swm.app_user_nm --승인부서확인자성명 ,swm.app_dept_cd --승인부서코드 ,swm.app_dept_nm --승인부서명 ,swm.app_confirm_dt --승인부서확인일시 ,swm.over_user_id --연장확인자ID ,swm.over_user_nm --연장확인자명 ,swm.over_confirm_dt --연장확인일시 ,swm.locate_pnt_x --X축_좌표위치 ,swm.locate_pnt_y --Y축_좌표위치 ,swm.del_yn --삭제여부 ,swm.spm_etc --안전보호구 기타 from saf_wkod_master swm left outer join com_code_master WKCode on swm.wkod_kind_cd = WKCode.code and WKCode.code_group_cd = 'WKOD_KIND' left outer join com_code_master PSCode on swm.wkod_step_cd = PSCode.code and PSCode.code_group_cd = 'WKOD_STEP' left outer join com_process CPCode on swm.process_cd = CPCode.process_no where 1=1
and swm.wkod_no = #{wkodNo}

select swus.wkod_spe_cd --안전작업사용보호구 코드 from saf_wkod_use_spe swus where 1=1
and swus.wkod_no = #{wkodNo}

select swmm.mat_mst_no ,swmm.wkod_mat_class ,WMCCode.code_nm as wkod_mat_class_nm ,swmm.wkod_mat_nm ,swmm.use_yn ,case when swmm.use_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as use_yn_nm ,swmm.sort_order from saf_wkod_mat_mst swmm inner join com_code_master WMCCode on swmm.wkod_mat_class = WMCCode.code and WMCCode.code_group_cd = 'WKOD_MAT_CLASS' inner join saf_wkod_mat swm on swmm.mat_mst_no = swm.mat_mst_no and swm.wkod_no = #{wkodNo} where 1=1 order by swmm.sort_order

select swci.chk_item_no --점검항목ID ,swci.wkod_kind_cd --작업종류코드 ,WKCode.code_nm as wkod_kind_nm --작업종류명 ,swci.wkod_duty_cd --점검부서구분 ,CDTCode.code_nm as wkod_duty_nm --점검부서명 ,swci.chk_item_nm --점검항목명 ,swci.use_yn --사용여부 ,swci.sort_order --정렬순서 from saf_wkod_chk_item swci inner join com_code_master WKCode on swci.wkod_kind_cd = WKCode.code and WKCode.code_group_cd = 'WKOD_KIND' inner join com_code_master CDTCode on swci.wkod_duty_cd = CDTCode.code and CDTCode.code_group_cd = 'WKOD_DPTY' left outer join saf_wkod_chk_result swcr on swci.chk_item_no = swcr.chk_item_no and swcr.wkod_no = #{wkodNo} where 1=1 and swci.use_yn = 'Y' and swci.wkod_duty_cd = #{searchFlag} order by swci.sort_order

select swci.chk_item_no --점검항목ID ,swci.wkod_kind_cd --작업종류코드 ,WKCode.code_nm as wkod_kind_nm --작업종류명 ,swci.wkod_duty_cd --점검부서구분 ,CDTCode.code_nm as wkod_duty_nm --점검부서명 ,swci.chk_item_nm --점검항목명 ,swci.use_yn --사용여부 ,swci.sort_order --정렬순서 from saf_wkod_chk_item swci inner join com_code_master WKCode on swci.wkod_kind_cd = WKCode.code and WKCode.code_group_cd = 'WKOD_KIND' inner join com_code_master CDTCode on swci.wkod_duty_cd = CDTCode.code and CDTCode.code_group_cd = 'WKOD_DPTY' inner join saf_wkod_chk_result swcr on swci.chk_item_no = swcr.chk_item_no and swcr.wkod_no = #{wkodNo} where 1=1 and swci.use_yn = 'Y' and swci.wkod_duty_cd = #{searchFlag} order by swci.sort_order
